DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to identify the expression signature of miR-181a, miR-196a and miR-21 in plasma of SLE patients and difference in their expression among groups with different systemic lupus erythematosis disease activity index (SLEDAI) scores.
DOC.brief_title: Circulating MicroRNAs in Understanding Pathogenesis of Systemic Lupus Erythematosis
DOC.criteria: Adult systemic lupus erythematosis patients Patients younger than 18 years, patients with other autoimmune diseases or malignancy.
